front.title: Include Routes - Extension to Resource ReserVation Protocol-Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE)

abstract.t: There are scenarios in which it is required that two or more LSPs or segments of LSPs follow same route in the network. This document specifies methods to communicate route inclusions along the loose hops during path setup using the Resource ReserVation Protocol- Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) protocol.
